name: KANTRA
description:
| PITCH

KANTRA is a VR roguelite sports game, that plays in a minimal, mythological setting.

In VR we can do anyting. In this game you materialize weapons in mid-air and use them to cast spells, defeating simple but powerful enemies. The game studies how we can harness the advantages of motion controllers to achieve flow with a large variety of options.

| CONTROLS

[Grab]   switch weapon
[Trigger]   activate weapon
[Move over Runes]   select weapon/spell
[Esc]   quit
